question: Mammoth Colossus - Permanent Ability - When opponent cards enter play in your DZ, they get 1 'frozen' counter. Cards with frozen counters have -1 skill while in your DZ
Mammoth Colossus - One Time Ability - If there are 3+ total frozen counters on opponent cards, automatically win this battle. Otherwise, add 1 frozen counter to each opponent active card
Shell Shield - Permanent Ability - The first time each turn this card would lose a battle, roll a d20. On 17+, force a tie instead
